Dragons.title: Fire Dragon
Dragons.description: It spits out an incalculable flame of fire, contains a long body, and is extremely aggressive.

Dragons.title: Water Dragon
Dragons.description: Spits water under pressure, and creates its own water with its tail

Dragons.title: Acid Dragon
Dragons.description: Spits deadly acid, which can disintegrate any living being with the slightest contact

Dragons.title: Forest Dragon
Dragons.description: He has control of all the fauna and flora around him, he is passive with humans, however, the fauna around him cannot be destroyed, he is dangerous and can make any plant grow to impale whoever is burning what is around him around

Dragons.title: Golden Dragon
Dragons.description: Attack with molten gold and create your own gold from your hands, It is usually extremely dangerous, when it has young

Dragons.title: Silver Dragon
Dragons.description: Attacks with Silver, and creates his own silver metal with eyes

Dragons.title: Earth Dragon
Dragons.description: He manipulates the earth to his liking, he can create unusual figures, with his element, he causes earthquakes and makes the earth generate spikes to impale his opponent

Dragons.title: Platinum Dragon
Dragons.description: Handle the Platinum, and everything it touches turns platinum, it is extremely dangerous to get close to it

Dragons.title: Dark Dragon
Dragons.description: He moves stealthily, in such a way that no human detects him in time, he has powers of, he can teleport and stays at night

Dragons.title: White Dragon
Dragons.description: His power is light and his enemy is the Dragon of Darkness, he is pious and very happy, he will protect you from all danger and some regions have him as a King
